titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution relating to the election of the President and the Vice President of the United States.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3255-3256)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 3/17/1994--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Provides for the direct popular election of the President and Vice President of the United States.
